pages.content:
Welcome to Document Processor

This is an example document demonstrating the capabilities of the Document Processor tool.

Features Overview

  • Rich Text Editing - Full formatting support including bold, italic, and underline text.
  • Automatic Pagination - Content automatically flows to new pages when needed.
  • Image Support - Embed images directly in your documents.
  • Table Creation - Build professional tables with ease.

Why Use Document Processor?

The Document Processor provides a seamless way to create professional documents with precise control over formatting and layout. Unlike traditional word processors, this tool gives you:

  1. Exact US Letter page dimensions
  2. Automatic content overflow handling
  3. Clean, distraction-free interface
  4. No software installation required
  5. Works in any modern browser

"The best tool for creating print-ready documents directly in your browser."

Getting Started

To begin using the Document Processor:

  1. Open the document-processor.html file in your browser
  2. Start typing or paste your content
  3. Use the formatting toolbar for styling
  4. Save your work regularly

Keyboard Shortcuts

ActionWindows/LinuxMac
BoldCtrl+BCmd+B
ItalicCtrl+ICmd+I
UnderlineCtrl+UCmd+U
SaveCtrl+SCmd+S

Tips for Best Results

  • Use the margin guides to ensure content stays within printable area
  • Check page breaks before printing
  • Export to HTML for web publishing
  • Save JSON files for future editing

Happy document processing!
